content: baby / toddler fingerless mitts these cute mitts are great for keeping hands warmer while still allowing baby to explore the world with little fingers they are also great drool absorbers difficulty beginner hookcandy com materials required ½ ball katia bamboo or other dk/sport wt yarn bamboo is recommended for its antibacterial pro- preties f 3 75 mm hook g 4 25mm hook yarn needle buttons & sewing needle optional gauge 5 sts = 1 inch size all sizes are stretchy to accommodate growing hands small baby - 3 25 long medium toddler - 3 5 long large large toddler / small child - 3 75 long crochet pattern ©2009 sylvia schuchardt contact hookcandy@gmail com *note - this pattern uses american terminology the following instructions are for all 3 sizes the instructions placed between parenthesis correspond to size s m l respectively - be careful to follow the instructions for your chosen size 1 chain 16 18 20 with g hook switch to f hook and beginning in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 15 17 19 across chain 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet 14 16 18 blo single_crochet 1 through both loops repeat step 2 for 16 18 20 row total shape thumb 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet 10 blo half_double_crochet 3 4 2 blo double_crochet 0 0 3 blo make last st through both loops 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet 12 13 14 blo single_crochet 1 through both loops repeat steps 3-4 once more 5 chain 1 turn bring other edge of mitt up behind current row and slip_stitch the two edges togeth- er through both loops of each when you reach the thumb opening bring up the edge that is below and to the left and continue to slip_stitch the edges together to the top of the mitt 6 chain 1 rotate so that the top opening of the mitt is facing up single_crochet 16 18 20 around the opening one st into the end of each row so that the right side of the sts face the inside of the mitt join to beginning with a slip_stitch end off 7 turn mitt inside out weave in any loose ends repeat steps 1-7 to make 2nd mitt abbreviations wt=weight st=stitch chain=chain single_crochet=single_crochet blo=back loops only half_double_crochet=half_double_crochet double_crochet=double cro- chet slip_stitch=slip_stitch this pattern is protected by copyright please do not sell or redistribute this pattern in any form selling the completed items made using this pattern is not permit- ted without express permission from the designer
